name: s67_droplet_wish
description: Digital Wishlist App The Digital Wishlist App allows users to create wishlists for things they want to buy, track price drops, and share their lists with friends and family for gifting ideas. Users can save items they wish to purchase, set alerts for price changes, and receive notifications. This app uses the MERN stack (MongoDB, Express, React, Node.js) and provides a full-stack solution for building and managing a wishlist.
